Posts.Content: Thank you for posting this.  I am about to start this stuff and was getting worried.  Nice to hear something good happened.
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: I'm glad carrot juice makes you feel better.  it may even help, nutrition-wise.  But if it cured cancer all by itself, the planet would be one big carrot field by now.
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Mets to the Bones

Posts.Content: That's great news.  Keep up the good work.
Posts.Title: Normal Mammo and ultrasound

Posts.Content: On Sep 28, 2014 3:01 AM Pamihami wrote: Yea ! for the diagnosis but be careful, fibrous tissue hid my tumor. Keep an eye on it . Yikes!  I have never heard that before -fibrous tissue hiding a tumor.  Thanks for mentioning it.
Posts.Title: Normal Mammo and ultrasound

Posts.Content: Please come back and tell us what the outcome it.  And I would not want to tell anyone what to do but if my mother had had BC three times and died from it I would be inclined to have mammos or ultrasounds more often if possible.  BC can show up on them before it can be felt.  Finding it earlier is better.  Best of luck to you.
Posts.Title: Normal Mammo and ultrasound
